LPGE Family

We were asked via a Facebook message about what the plans are for the start of the school year.

A Reopening Task Force started working on June 1st and has examined all three of the scenarios (in-person, hybrid and distance learning) and are prepared to finalize these plans once the Minnesota Department of Education makes a decision on which format schools will use this coming school year.

We are expecting this announcement the week of July 27th and we will share this information as soon as we know of the decision. Once we know what plan to follow, we will finalize our local plans and post them on the website and our Facebook page.

We thank you for your patience and your support as we work through the process of complying with state mandates and providing a safe and supportive environment for our students and staff.
